articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Major US Policy Updates: Defense, Social Security, and Political Appointments
articles.description: The U.S. has approved significant defense support for Taiwan and changes to Social Security affecting public pensioners. President Biden surpasses Trump's judicial appointments with inclusivity. Trump announces new ambassadorial and administrative picks, despite Republican opposition to his debt ceiling demands. Congress averts a government shutdown with a last-minute funding bill.
articles.content: In a move certain to ruffle Beijing's feathers, President Joe Biden has approved $571.3 million in defense support for Taiwan, including a potential sale of $265 million worth of military equipment. Despite the absence of formal ties with Taipei, U.S... [763 chars]

articles.author: Washington Examiner
articles.title: Lara Trump removes name from Rubio Senate seat short list
articles.description: The announcement comes after her father reportedly spoke with Gov. Ron DeSantis (R-FL) about appointing Lara to the Senate seat.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump’s daughter-in-law, Lara Trump, announced late Saturday that she will be removing her name from the short list for Sen. Marco Rubio‘s (R-FL) Senate seat.
In a statement posted to X, Lara said that “After an incredible amou... [1411 chars]

articles.author: The Globe and Mail
articles.title: Lara Trump withdraws from consideration to replace Marco Rubio in U.S. Senate
articles.description: There was speculation that Lara Trump, who served as co-chair of the Republican National Committee in the lead-up to the 2024 election, would succeed Rubio in the Senate

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Nominates Tilman Fertitta as Ambassador to Italy
articles.description: Donald Trump has announced his intention to nominate Tilman Fertitta, billionaire owner of the Houston Rockets, as his administration's ambassador to Italy. Fertitta, a successful businessman and philanthropist, chairs Landry's, a large enterprise managing restaurants, hotels, and casinos across the United States.
articles.content:
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump announced on Saturday his decision to nominate Tilman Fertitta, billionaire owner of the Houston Rockets basketball team, as the next ambassador to Italy in his administration.
Fertitta is recognized as the chairman ... [367 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Lara Trump Steps Back: What's Next?
articles.description: Lara Trump has withdrawn her name from consideration to replace U.S. Senator Marco Rubio, who was tapped by Donald Trump as secretary of state. Lara, co-chair of the Republican National Committee, announced her decision citing contemplation and encouragement. Governor DeSantis will choose Rubio's successor.
articles.content: Lara Trump, the daughter-in-law of President-elect Donald Trump, announced her decision to remove her name from the roster of candidates hoping to succeed outgoing U.S. Senator Marco Rubio. Rubio has been selected by Trump to serve as the upcoming se... [672 chars]

articles.author: Yahoo News
articles.title: Lara Trump withdraws from consideration to replace Rubio in US Senate
articles.description: (Reuters) -Lara Trump, daughter-in-law of President-elect Donald Trump, said on Saturday she has removed her name from consideration to replace outgoing U.S. Senator Marco Rubio. Rubio was picked by Trump to serve as secretary of state. Florida Governor Ron DeSantis will pick a replacement for Rubio, who is expected to resign as senator when Trump takes office on Jan. 20.
articles.content:
By Jasper Ward
(Reuters) -Lara Trump, daughter-in-law of President-elect Donald Trump, said on Saturday she has removed her name from consideration to replace outgoing U.S. Senator Marco Rubio.
Rubio was picked by Trump to serve as secretary of state... [1224 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Mark Burnett: From Reality TV Maestro to UK's Diplomatic Envoy
articles.description: Mark Burnett, known for producing hit TV shows like 'The Apprentice', has been selected by President-elect Trump to serve as a special envoy to the UK. Burnett brings significant experience in television and business to this diplomatic role, reflecting Trump's propensity to appoint high-profile individuals to key positions.
articles.content: Mark Burnett, the influential television producer behind 'The Apprentice,' has been named by President-elect Donald Trump as a special envoy to the United Kingdom. Burnett's appointment underscores Trump's strategy of recruiting prominent figures wit... [656 chars]

articles.author: The Australian Financial Review
articles.title: More aid for Ukraine, but Trump wants 5pc NATO defence spending target
articles.description: The US president-elect now intends to maintain supplies to Kyiv after his inauguration, but will demand allies more than double their financial commitment.
articles.content:
London/Brussels/Washington | Donald Trump’s team has told European officials that the incoming US president will demand NATO member states increase defence spending to 5 per cent of GDP, but plans to continue supplying military aid to Ukraine.
The US... [276 chars]

articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Trump appoints The Apprentice producer as US special envoy to UK
articles.description: Mark Burnett, who also created Survivor, Shark Tank and The Voice, lacks diplomatic and foreign policy experience
articles.content:
Donald Trump has appointed Mark Burnett, a British television producer who helped produce Trump’s show The Apprentice, as the US’s special envoy to the UK.

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Donald Trump appoints British TV producer who created The Apprentice as special envoy to UK
articles.description: US president-elect Donald Trump says he has appointed British TV producer Mark Burnett as his special envoy to the UK.
articles.content:
US president-elect Donald Trump says he has appointed British TV producer Mark Burnett as his special envoy to the UK.
